channel.title: How would i add this on easy rsc
channel.description: ok when someone uses a auto clicker to click so fast, how do you add something to recognise this and lagg out and crash only the client that is doing it and not the server itself.

item.title: How would i add this on easy rsc
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

freaky5000:

Only person that may help you with this is crooks or yong-min that’s if they know how to do it. Nobody else really contributes to noobs-new people who don’t know much about java.

Crooks has no idea how to stop it, and pretty sure yong min doesn’t either. Unless they have ripped it off from moparclassic.

Read full topic
item.source: How would i add this on easy rsc

or a walkthrough on here i was looking at mopars, but i want to be sure all classes i need to look at.
[/quote]PacketThrottler, and Server (only to add the filter to the filter chain).[/quote]
so obv the PacketThrottler and what other classes in the server?
